ing: 8 ounces thinly sliced deli roast beef, cut or torn into bite-size pieces
8 ounces sliced smoked mozzarella cheese, cut into 24 pieces
des: "A roast beef sandwich made into a delicious little bite. Seasoned roast beef, smoky mozzarella, and red onion are topped with a creamy horseradish sauce! You know you want some!"
ins: Arrange Pretzel Crisps(R) onto a large tray. Top with roast beef and a piece of mozzarella cheese. Add a slice or 2 of red onion. Put a dollop (about 1/4 teaspoon) of horseradish on the onion. Garnish with chives.
